榼榼榼

榼字的基本解释

榼
kē
古代盛酒的器具：“使行人执榼承饮。”
泛指盒一类的器物：果榼。粉榼。
刀剑的套子。

榼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kē］
［《廣韻》苦盍切，入盍，溪。］
亦作“醘1”。
(1)古代盛酒或贮水的器具。
(2)泛指盒类容器。
(3)鞘。
(4)关合。

榼字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第12
【唐韻】苦盍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】克盍切，?音?。【說文】酒器也。【徐曰】榼之爲言盍也。盍，本作盇。覆也。【左傳·成十六年】行人執榼承飲，造于子重。　又貯水器。【淮南子·汜論訓】霤水足以溢壺榼，而江河不能實漏卮。　又藤名。【本草拾遺】榼藤如通草，其實三年方熟，若雞卵㱿，貯丹藥，經年不壞。

榼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榼字的起名意思

暂无。

Tong
Basic explanation of words
Tong
kē
Ancient wine-producing utensils: "make pedestrians hold the drink."
Refers to utensils such as boxes: Guodong. Fantong.
Sword cover.
Tong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kē］
["Guangyun" cuts bitterly, enters the stream, and enters the stream. ]
Also known as "Lang 1".
(1) Ancient utensils for holding wine or storing water.
(2) Refers to box containers in general.
(3) Sheath.
(4) Close and close.
Tong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 No. 12
[Tang Yun] Bitter Qi cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ke Qi cut, "yin?". [Said the text] The wine vessel is also. [Xu Yue] It's the same as the words.盍, this is made 盇. Cover also. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen years of adulthood] Pedestrians hold drinking water, created by Zizhong.　Reservoir again. [Huinanzi·Pun Lun Xun] The water is enough to overflow the pot, but the river cannot actually leak.　The name of the rattan. [Materia Medica Supplements] The vines are like grasses. In fact, they are cooked in three years. If the chicken eggs are stored, they will not be bad for years.
